name: Watch Out (itch) (KoopHaussgames)
description:
Since the beginning of time falling fruit has been the most hazardous hazard to the lives of so many baby birds . . . 

Use:

A and D keys or Arrow Keys to move your bird across the screen and avoid the hazardous falling fruit.

Thanks to:

Julien Nicolas for SFX

and

Marma for the song "Infinite Happiness"
